patthana23.19:1.1: Nakusalaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana23.19:2.1: Naakusalaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana23.19:3.1: Naabyākataṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana23.19:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naabyākataṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana23.19:5.1: Naakusalaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naabyākataṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana23.19:6.1: Nakusalaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naakusalaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana23.19:7.1: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.19:8.1: Nakusalaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.19:9.1: Nakusalaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
